topics.title: is it possable to modify ZeroNet so i can connect to it remotely
topics.body: i want to run zeronet as a daemon on a another pc so i can run my node 24/7 and not have to worry about it as much

2@20.body: Zeronet is not a darknet nor was it meant to be
i think i dont know im kind of new to zero net but if you want a darknet use tor or freenet how ever tor is not p2p

1@13.body: i know i will be slapped for saying this but why dont they some thing like twitter or facebook
if they make a market place will they take bittcoin or doge coin
how about Zero Book :D nah i think that name is taken

1@6.body: a Freenet friend of mine told me about NetZero

1@64.body: thanks nofish i owe you one
